definition: to dash/to move forward quickly/to bulge/to protrude/to break through/to rush out/sudden/Taiwan pr. [tu2]

sentences.english: The acting career plummeted suddenly, he relied on alcohol to release.
sentences.chinese: 演藝事業突然一落千丈，他便借酒澆愁。

sentences.english: Suddenly I realized that the sixth and seventh spaces were the solution to the problem.
sentences.chinese: 突然，我意識到第六和第七個空位就是這道題的答案。

sentences.english: The image of the woman popped into his head out of the blue.
sentences.chinese: 那個女人的形象突然出現在他的腦海裏。

sentences.english: Pennies from heaven, the opportunity came up.
sentences.chinese: 喜從天降，機會突然來了。

sentences.english: Hold the mouth of a balloon filled with air. Let it go suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 捏緊一個充氣的汽球口，然後突然鬆開手。

sentences.english: How do you cope when your brain locks up?
sentences.chinese: 當腦子突然抽住的時候，你會如何解決呢？

sentences.english: Thank hypocrisy, thanks to get away with parading falsehoods suddenly sincere lies.
sentences.chinese: 感謝虛僞突然誠懇，感謝謊言弄假成真。

sentences.english: Suddenly the hero's son picked up a knife and killed the dragon.
sentences.chinese: 突然英雄的兒子拿起刀殺了龍。

sentences.english: A gun shot suddenly pealed forth and shot its flames into the air.
sentences.chinese: 突然一聲炮響，一道火光升上天空。

sentences.english: A magnificent gleam of triumph sprang into Cowper-wood's eye.
sentences.chinese: 柯帕伍德的眼睛裏突然透露出勝利的莊嚴的光芒來。

sentences.english: The true night suddenly smiled to make a noise.
Suddenly I had the idea of writing a message in a bottle.
sentences.chinese: “我突然冒出了寫一封“瓶中信”的念頭。

sentences.english: Timing recently had a autumnal equinox, feel suddenly increased some cool idea.
sentences.chinese: 時序剛剛過了秋分，就覺得突然增加了一些涼意。

sentences.english: It took Cindy a long time to catch on to what Bill was saying.
sentences.chinese: 辛迪許久以後才突然明白比爾所說的話。

sentences.english: Why did you change your mobile phone number suddenly?
sentences.chinese: 你爲什麼突然間換電話號碼？

sentences.english: Before Mei filed her complaint about Hong to her husband, Hong disappeared suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 還沒等梅婧向葉城告狀，洪小玲卻突然失蹤了。

definition: in a short while/all at once/all of a sudden
unexpectedly/to one's surprise/in spite of everything/in that crazy way/actually/to go as far as to
unexpectedly/actually/to go so far as to/indeed
at once/right away/immediately/on horseback (i.e. by military force)

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
